segments.text: I walk in and immediately notice the sink running over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't even glanced at it, still polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, kids are up to something with the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on a stool, hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping back, oh my gosh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, arm extended for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes the garden glow nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in an apron, looking every bit the homemaker.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's forming fast under her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is wild; no one sees the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies must be fresh, they're grabbing so eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR
